name: FlightPlan
desc: An interactive flight scheduler targeted for companies who want to visualize and refine schedule for the day. Built using Python, Mongo, Pandas, OpenSky API, Amadeus API, Flask, and Folium.

name: DraftWatch
desc: An application that tracks the current draft position for fantasy football. Only works in preseason due to website's format. Built using Python, Requests, Pandas, and Streamlit.

name: StaticSnow Escape VR
desc: VR group project to simulate a static equilibrium physics lab.
